pages.text: During their adventures, fishermen discovered some extremely valuable items known as the Ultimate Treasures.

$(br)Legend tells of a pirate captain who hid his treasure in the heart of a deep sea whirlpool. Despite many attempts, no adventurer succeeded in finding it. Only fishermen with a level 4 or higher $(item)Fish Fighter$() enchantment have a chance of fishing up the Pirate Treasure, worth the equivalent of 128 fish baskets.

$(br)The Power Fruit is a rare treasure, appearing in calm seas after storms. With a level 5 $(item)Fish Fighter$() enchantment, fishermen can catch this fruit, which permanently boosts attack power. It can be used up to 8 times, enhancing strength with each use.

$(br)The Life Fruit, hidden in ocean depths, can only be caught with a level 5 $(item)Fish Fighter$() enchantment. It grants the user permanent health increases by 1 heart per use, but can only be used 3 times. Many adventurers have regained vitality from this rare fruit.
$(br)$(br)$(br)There may still be more treasures in this world awaiting your discovery...
